column33: domain_CYTOPLASMIC_DOMAIN_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be outside the membrane, in the cytoplasm.
column34: domain_TRANSMEMBRANE_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be embedded in the membrane.
column37: domain_NON_CYTOPLASMIC_DOMAIN_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be outside the membrane, in the extracellular region.
